document_data.name: Coke
document_data.mainbody: '''Coke''' was an uncommon form of highly refined fuel distilled from [[coal]] or [[petroleum]].
document_data.Properties: Coke was a gray, [[carbon]]-rich mineral-like substance that burned readily, with similarities to [[charcoal]].{{Cite dragon/13/How Heavy Is My Giant|7}}
document_data.Availability: Coke was normally processed from coal in an oven, but could also be found naturally as "igneous coke" when underground heat and pressure acted on underground deposits.
